aboutMe.bio: Hello! I'm Eric Zukisa Maza, I'm a keen learner and believe in an interdisciplinary approach to understanding the world and I am an ordinary person who has been blessed with extraordinary experiences. I'm a Xhosa guy who once studied Computer Science at the University of Western Cape, but not that long due to finances. Now I'm a good FullStack DEV at Life_Choices.

reachMe.address: 314 Imam Haron Road, Cape Town, South Africa, 7780 SA

testimonials.name: Thembela Selani
testimonials.message: Zukisa is a smart student with a bright future. He always has a smile on his face and is a pleasure to work with. I look forward to seeing what he will achieve in the future and highly recommend him.

testimonials.name: Vuyile Magwaza
testimonials.message: Zukisa Maza is a hardworking person with perseverance, always eager to learn or work, and he is quite friendly.

testimonials.name: Asanda Radebe
testimonials.message: As a fellow student, I think Zukisa has a friendly and caring personality. He loves participating when he knows the answer. He is a hardworking individual who always shows determination to learn and to help others.

testimonials.name: Nkosinathi Siyeni
testimonials.message: Zukisa is a hard worker and a determined person in general. Additionally, he is a person who loves a challenge.

testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
testimonials.message: As a fellow lecturer, I think Zukisa has a friendly and caring personality. He loves participating when he knows the answer. He is a hardworking individual who always shows determination to learn and to help others.

testimonials.name: Candice Amon
testimonials.message: As a fellow Manager, I think Zukisa has a friendly and caring personality. He loves participating when he knows the answer. He is a hardworking individual who always shows determination to learn and to help others.
